snippet: The two Republican debates, a mere 12 hours apart, offered stark contrasts in how these elaborately staged and planned productions can play out unpredictably.
abstract: Two Republican presidential debates, broadcast a mere twelve hours apart, offer stark example of how elaborately staged productions can play out unpredictably; ABC debate is marked by ponderous questions and refusal by candidates to attack each other; NBC debate, by contrast, is far more confrontational.
lead_paragraph: The two Republican debates, a mere 12 hours apart, offered stark contrasts in how these elaborately staged and planned productions can play out unpredictably.

headline.seo: Dueling Debates Vary in Style, Tone and Content
headline.main: Dueling Debates Vary in Style, Tone and Content
headline.print_headline: Dueling Debates Vary in Style, Tone and Content
